metadata.Title: CVE-2017-14226 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: WP1StylesListener.cpp, WP5StylesListener.cpp, and WP42StylesListener.cpp inlibwpd 0.10.1 mishandle iterators, which allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (heap-based buffer over-read in the WPXTableList class inWPXTable.cpp). This vulnerability can be triggered in LibreOffice before5.3.7. It may lead to suffering a remote attack against a LibreOfficeapplication.

criterions.comment: libwpd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
